channel.title: Weirdest Place You've Had A Pimple
channel.description:
What's the weirdest place you've ever had a pimple?
I had one right underneath my bellybutton.

item.title: Weirdest Place You've Had A Pimple
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Cole1497:

Fucking right inside my ear its annoying as shit

&

Pwnd:

The inside of my nose. It may have been an ingrown hair, actually. Painful.

I’m allergic to the fertilizer(assuming that’s what it is) that is put in the grass at my school and I get allergic reactions and have these cyst/pimple like things appear. I’ve had one on my knee that got infected and my whole leg swelled up to 2x it’s size. It had to get lanced… one of the worst pains I’ve ever experienced was getting the numbing needle right in the middle of it.

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest Place You've Had A Pimple

item.title: Weirdest Place You've Had A Pimple
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:10, topic:540892”]I had one on my left eyebrow when I was younger[/quote][quote=“Mack n cheese, post:12, topic:540892”]left ass cheek. hurt to sit a few days ha[/quote]I’m guessing it being on the left side made it more weird.

Read full topic
item.source: Weirdest Place You've Had A Pimple

item.title: Weirdest Place You've Had A Pimple
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:9, topic:540892”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=659758.msg4411737#msg4411737 date=1393978251]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=659758.msg4411735#msg4411735 date=1393978160]

Head of my dick, hands down the most painful I’ve ever had.
[/quote]… you have herpes

Nope, never came back, It was back when I ended up without water for 2 weeks and nobody would let me come over to take a shower. Thank god I was jobless at the moment.
[/quote]That’s probably something you should’ve kept to yourself.[/quote]

Yes I agree, but it is hella funny hahaha

Read full topic

item.title: Weirdest Place You've Had A Pimple
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“kronikz, post:3, topic:540892”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=659758.msg4411696#msg4411696 date=1393971420]
The inside of my nose. It may have been an ingrown hair, actually. Painful.
[/quote]
these are the most painful mother fudgeers ever. God damn.

Anyways, I think most people can agree that when you have no acne but one pimple appears right on the center of your forehead and you look Indian.[/quote]
ever had a boil/cyst? they’re a lot worse.

probably ass for me
